item.title: Back in Israel
item.description: Last August I came back to Israel, after 3 years in North Carolina, USA. It was a very nice period of my life, but it is great to be back! I already have an office in the Department of Soil and Water Sciences, and I’m starting to get acquainted with the people and the facilites. You can find me in office 19 (ground floor) in Lubell building. Come have some coffee with me!
